column4: I am trying to install mplayer and it dont download saying "Failed to fetch http://in.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/s/svgalib/libsvga1_1.4.3-27ubuntu1_i386.deb Could not resolve 'in.archive.ubuntu.com'"
ok, I have tried in sudo too.
use  this without quotes, "sudo apt-get install netselect-apt"
it says "E: Couldn't find package netselect-apt
Try this without quotes, "sudo apt-get update"
completed with a message "Could not resolve 'in.archive.ubuntu.com'"
there are several, and indian server is selected.
yes, I have unchecked that and selected main server
it will list you mplayer, choose that for installation
this server is totally down http://in.archive.ubuntu.com/ , so nobody can't fetch anything
here after you don't want to open synaptic, use apt commands, as i listed you before
